section.heading: Fees.
section.text: MPD may establish by rule a fee, to be imposed on a covered individual or participating agency, for subscription of a covered individual in the District of Columbia Rap Back Program. The fee may be imposed on an annual basis.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 3046 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-146, Sept. 3, 2025, 72 DCR 9623).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 3046 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-210, Nov. 24, 2025, 72 DCR 13514).
